title: Knight of the Purple Ribbon: Baron de Graffenried's Colonial Adventures
description: Narrated by Richard Thomas.A sweeping historic drama based on the true life adventures of Baron Christoph de Graffenried, founder of New Bern North Carolina, From the castles of 18th century Switzerland, to the opulent British court, to the wilds of colonial North Carolina, "Knight of the Purple Ribbon" is filled with action and romance, set against such historic events as Cary's Rebellion. In this amazing tale of the New World Christoph struggles to carve a settlement out of the wildness, with his spirited and beautiful bride at his side.
author: Jennifer Leigh Wells
